introduction: SYNOPSISJin-wu is a poor college student. He quits school and gets a job for the sake of his girlfriend, Young-ae. A man named Hyun-ma appears before him and tries to tempt Jin-wu into a world of corruption but Jin-wu doesn't succumb. Hyun-ma kills Young-ae in a disguised hit-and-run accident and forces Jin-wu to participate in his evil plans. Jin-wu resembles Dong-hun, the son of the infamous businessman, Chairman Kim. Hyun-ma plans to have Jin-wu go to Chairman Kim's house as Dong-hun and steal one million dollars. Jin-wu finds out the secret code to Chairman Kim's house. He marries Hye-ri, Dong-hun's fiancee, and is about to leave on their honeymoon when he is revealed to be a fake and arrested. Chairman Kim does with his fortune…故事高校贫困生吉·伍旨在中断学业，并获得一个情人李·扬·阿以苦为他工作。执行当前被试探的道路出现了一个男人指法邪吉·伍的根源是冒充肇事运行事故杀吉·伍李·扬·阿使得它加入了邪恶阴谋的诱惑hyeonma。阴谋hyeonma是dolriryeo吉·伍正在筹划Donghoon代替了外汇1亿去吉·伍gimhoejang的房子，因为臭名昭著的强盗企业家gimhoejang儿子Donghoon和脸型很相似。吉·伍从家里找出了密码，嫁给他的未婚妻一时的惠利Donghoon被逮捕，他被称为是假的后离开gimhoejang蜜月。Gimhoejang是财产.....
